entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts who has never won a point for Gryffindor before.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend and classmate, mentioned as being nudged by Harry in the ribs.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A Slytherin student who looks stunned and horrified after Gryffindor wins.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, mentioned as calling over the storm of applause to make a comment about needing a change of decoration.

entities.name: ravenclaw and hufflepuff
entities.description: Two houses at Hogwarts that are celebrating Gryffindor's victory, mentioned as being part of the storm of applause.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: A house at Hogwarts that has been defeated by Gryffindor, mentioned as having its decorations changed.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: The winning house in the story, mentioned as having its decorations changed and being celebrated by students from other houses.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is shaking Professor McGonagall's hand with a forced smile, indicating that his feelings towards Harry have not changed.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is being shaken hands by Snape, mentioned as having a friendly relationship with him.

relationships.description: Harry is a member of Gryffindor house, mentioned as being part of the winning team.
Malfoy is a member of Slytherin house, mentioned as looking stunned and horrified after Gryffindor wins.
Dumbledore has authority over Harry, mentioned as calling over the storm of applause to make a comment about needing a change of decoration.
Snape and Professor McGonagall are friends, mentioned as shaking hands with a forced smile.
